thread.title: Jockey Gutierrez wins 5 races at Santa Anita
thread.title_full: Jockey Gutierrez wins 5 races at Santa Anita

author: wtopstaff
title: Jockey Gutierrez wins 5 races at Santa Anita
text:
Home » News » Sports » Jockey Gutierrez wins 5… Jockey Gutierrez wins 5 races at Santa Anita By The Associated Press October 16, 2015 8:24 pm 
ARCADIA, Calif. (AP) — Mario Gutierrez rode five winners in the first six races Friday at Santa Anita. 
He won the first race by 1 1/2 lengths with even-money favorite Stealth Drone. He skipped the second and then won the third by 1 1/4 lengths with 8-1 shot Frank Conversation, trained by Doug O’Neill and owned by J. Paul Reddam. 
Gutierrez teamed with them when he rode I’ll Have Another to victory in the 2012 Kentucky Derby and Preakness. 
He won the fourth race by 3 1/2 lengths on 9-5 shot Lily Pod. Gutierrez caught a break in the fifth race. He was moved up from second to first aboard 9-5 shot Sleepwalker via a disqualification of the winner. He won the sixth race by a nose aboard Light Striker. 
Gutierrez says he once won five races in a day at Hastings Racecourse in Vancouver, British Columbia. 
The 29-year-old jockey didn’t have a mount in the last two races on the card. Topics:
